channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple Author Box
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple Author Box

item.title: CVE-2023-3601|2024-08-02T07:01:57.020Z -- unknown -- simple%20author%20box
item.description: The Simple Author Box WordPress plugin before 2.52 does not verify a user ID before outputting information about that user, leading to arbitrary user information disclosure to users with a role as low as Contributor.
